QuestData.Title: Growing the Farm II: The Broken Wagon
QuestData.Description: Hey $n. I've been looking at that wagon every day, day in and day out, since the day I moved in. Quite an eyesore, don't you think?$B$BI heard in town that Fish Fellreed is quite handy with tools. She might be able to fix it up, and then we could turn that patch of land into a plot for farming.$B$BWhy don't you talk to her and see if she'd be willing to do the job?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Fish Fellreed at Cattail Lake or the Halfhill Market in the Valley of the Four Winds.
